quote:
The sky above the port was the color of television, tuned to a
dead channel.
author: William Gibson

quote: My schedule for today lists a six-hour self-accusatory depression.
author: Philip K. Dick
source: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

quote: You will be required to do wrong no matter where you go. It is the basic condition of life, to be required to violate your own identity. At some time, every creature which lives must do so.
author: Philip K. Dick
source: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

quote: Everything in life is just for a while
author: Philip K. Dick

quote:
The future is there... looking back at us. Trying to make sense
of the fiction we will have become.
author: William Gibson

quote:
See, the world is full of things more powerful than us. But if
you know how to catch a ride, you can go places
author: Neal Stephenson

quote: No matter where you go, everyoneâ€™s connected.
author: Lain Iwakura

quote: That's sad. How plastic and artificial life has become. It gets harder and harder to find something...
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: Real love, real friends, real body parts...
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: The brighttest light casts the darkest shadow.
author: Jess C. Scott

quotes: You have to understand, most of these people are not ready to be unplugged. And many of them are so inured, so hopelessly dependent on the system, that they will fight to protect it.
author: Morpheus
